name: Wumpo

ability.name: Guardian Of The Snowy Mountain
ability.description: Can be ridden. While in team, Wumpo helps carry supplies, increasing the player's max carrying capacity.

description: Researchers once tried to shave off its hair to reveal its true form. In the end, only hair was left, as if that was all there was to begin with.

skills.name: Ice Missile
skills.description: Creates ice lances in the air that fly towards enemies.

skills.name: Wind Cutter
skills.description: Fires a high speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Icicle Cutter
skills.description: Creates a crescent blade of ice and hurls it forward.

skills.name: Iceberg
skills.description: Summons a sharp ice lance under an enemy.

skills.name: Cryst Breath
skills.description: Enshrouds an enemy in a frigid blast of air, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: Blizzard Spike
skills.description: Creates a giant lump of ice and hurls it at an enemy. It deals damage to those in the surrounding area upon impact.

skills.name: Solar Blast
skills.description: Charges solar energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
